text: Prigotov'te [, veruyushchiye,] protiv neveruyushchikh skol'ko mozhete voyennoy sily i vznuzdannykh koney - takim obrazom vy budete derzhat' v strakhe vragov Allakha i vashikh vragov, a sverkh togo i inykh [vragov], o kotorykh vy i ne dogadyvayetes', no Allakhu vedomo o nikh. I skol'ko by vy ni potratili na puti Allakha, vam budet uplacheno spolna i k vam ne budet proyavlena nespravedlivost'
